data.text: Recent publications RECENT PUBLICATIONS BY MEMBERS OF THE STAFF AND BY RESEARCH STUDENTS WORKING UNDER THEIR SUPERVISION The publications information has been derived from the College’s Research Support System. Every effort has been made to ensure that the information is accurate and complete. Please notify the Research Support Systems Administrator (email: rssadmin@tcd.ie) of any errors or omissions which will be corrected in next year’s Calendar. Faculty of Arts, Humanities and Social Sciences School of Business Barry, Frank, ‘Institutional capacity and the Celtic Tiger economy’, The shadow economy, corruption and governance, eds M. Pickhardt and E. Shinnick, Edward Elgar (2008), 79-95 Policy coherence for development: the state of play in Ireland, Dublin, Institute for International Integration Studies (2009), 215 pp. [Frank Barry, Michael King and Alan Matthews] ‘Politics and fiscal policy under Lemass: a theoretical appraisal’, Economic and Social Review, 40, 4 (2009), 393-406 ‘FDI and labor markets’, Princeton encyclopedia of the world economy, eds K. Reinert and R.S. Rajan, Princeton, Princeton University Press (2008), 464-9 Brady, Mairead, ‘Requirements for an evolving model of supply chain finance: a technology and service providers perspective’, Communications of the IBIMA, 10 (2009), 227-35 [M.R. Fellenz, C. Augustenborg, M. Brady and J. Greene] ‘Understanding technology adoption within the service dominant logic’, The 2009 Naples forum on services: service-dominant logic, service science and network theory, 16-19 June, eds Evert Gummesson, Cristina Mele and Francisco Polese (2009), 1-19 [E. Claffey and M. Brady] ‘RFID and data capture technologies in global service supply chains: meeting the information management challenge’, The international business information management conference (10th IBIMA), June, Malaysia (2008), 1-18 [M.R. Fellenz and M. Vecchi and L. Brennan] ‘Sovereign wealth funds: the new global financial player’, Centre Interdisciplinaire de Recherche sur le Commerce Exterieur et l’Eonomie − Les Cahiers de Recherc he, 12 (2009), 111-28 [R. Rios-Morales and L. Brennan] ‘Quality management: a cross-cultural perspective’, Cross-Cultural Management: An International Journal, 16, 2 (2009), 149-64 [A. Vecchi and L. Brennan] ‘The role of collaborative innovation in trade facilitation’, 2009 global forum for business as an agent of world benefit, June, Cleveland, Ohio, ed. David Cooperrider (2009), 52 [L. Brennan, P. O’Dwyer and C. O’Riordan] ‘The emergence of sovereign wealth funds as contributors of foreign direct investment’, 2009 Oxford business and economics conference, Oxford, June, ed. A. Gupta (2009), 20 [R. Rios- Morales and L. Brennan] ‘The investment development path theory: evidence from India’, 2009 Academy of International Business annual conference, June, San Diego, eds T.
